name: Sabotage
Lore: 'Poorly equipped Rebels must rely on clandestine strikes against the massive Imperial military. Computer ''slicing'' and system tampering have proven most effective.',
Text: 'During your control phase, target one weapon, device or vehicle at same site as your Undercover spy. Draw destiny. If destiny > target''s deploy cost, target is lost (may be stolen instead if spy also a thief). OR Cancel Informant.',
